sn45.30:3.1: 30. Uttiyasutta
sn45.30:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā uttiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn45.30:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā uttiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.30:4.4: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn45.30:4.6: Katame nu kho pañca kāmaguṇā vuttā bhagavatā’”ti?
sn45.30:4.8: Pañcime kho, uttiya, kāmaguṇā vuttā mayā.
sn45.30:4.10: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā … pe …
sn45.30:4.13: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
sn45.30:4.14: ime kho, uttiya, pañca kāmaguṇā vuttā mayā.
sn45.30:4.15: Imesaṃ kho, uttiya, pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.30:4.20: Imesaṃ kho, uttiya, pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ pahānāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo”ti.
